opening_data.job_requirements:
4+ years experience in Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC), Oracle Process Cloud Service (PCS), Oracle Integration Cloud Service (ICS).
Overall technology experience - 6+ years.
Experience in Web Services (SOAP & REST using XML/JSON Payloads).
Understanding of Inherent tools and technologies of SaaS Applications (FBDI, BIP, ADFDI, Services in OER, Applications Composer, BIP, etc.).
Hands-On Experience of XSLT.
Hands-On Experience in data migration/integration methods i.e., SOAP and Rest Web Services, FBDI, and ADF DI.
Hands-On Experience with reporting tools such as OTBI, and BI Publisher.
Hands-On development of packages and functions using SQL/PLSQL and exposing them as REST using ORDS.
Hands-on with development and unit testing of integration components and web services (SOAP/REST) using OIC.
Hands-on with development and unit testing of VBCS components using OIC.
Strong knowledge of Oracle development tools, some e-Business application functionality, system administration, database structure, online patching, and knowledge of multi-Org architecture.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Design and develop integrations in OIC to Oracle SaaS Cloud including making REST and SOAP calls, FBDI File Uploads.
Design and develop customizations using Visual Builder and Process Builder in OIC to Oracle OPERA Cloud and ERP Cloud.
Support various Integration Interfaces in Oracle Cloud linking vital Business Critical Systems – Oracle and other systems – monitoring for issues and resolving them to maintain stability in the customers' business.
Design and develop Oracle OPERA, ERP Cloud modules.
Hands-on development support for implemented customizations using Visual Builder and Process Builder in OIC to Oracle OPERA Cloud.
Complete development tasks based on requirements submitted by business partners and best practices.
Develop additional various Integration Interfaces in Oracle Cloud to deliver high availability, rapidly developed, fully automated solutions.
Design and develop integrations in OIC to legacy systems.
opening_data.skill_set: Oracle Integration Cloud, Oracle Process Cloud Service, Oracle Integration Cloud Service, Web Services, SOAP, REST, SaaS Applications

opening_data.job_requirements:
Bachelor's or Mast  er's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Science, or a related field.
Minimum of 7 years of experience as a Data Architect or in a similar role.
Proven experience in data modeling, ETL design, and data integration.
Experience in the upstream oil and gas industry is highly desirable.
Proficiency in data modeling tools (e.g., ER/Studio, Erwin, or similar).
Strong SQL skills and experience with relational databases (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server, or PostgreSQL).
Experience with ETL tools (e.g., Informatica, Talend, SSIS, or similar).
Knowledge of big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark) and cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
Familiarity with data visualization and business intelligence tools (e.g., Spotfire, Tableau, Power BI).
Experience in using Spotfire Web Player.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Collaborate with business and IT stakeholders to understand and gather data requirements.
Facilitate discussions to define data needs, models, and sources.
Translate business requirements into data architecture specifications.
Design and implement robust, scalable, and efficient data models.
Develop and maintain logical and physical data models for data warehouses, data lakes, and operational databases.
Ensure data models are aligned with business objectives and technical requirements.
Define and design ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to integrate data from various sources.
Develop data integration strategies that ensure data accuracy, consistency, and timeliness.
Implement data transformations that support business reporting and analytics.
Establish data governance standards and practices to ensure high-quality data management.
Oversee the lifecycle of data from ingestion to storage, processing, and archiving.
Ensure data security, privacy, and compliance with industry regulations.
Provide technical guidance and oversight to data engineers, ETL developers, and database administrators.
Conduct data model reviews and ETL code reviews to ensure compliance with best practices.
Foster a culture of continuous improvement and innovation within the data team.
Optimize data models and ETL processes for performance and scalability.
Identify and resolve bottlenecks in data processing and storage.
Create comprehensive documentation for data models, ETL processes, and data governance practices.
Conduct training sessions for business and IT stakeholders on data architecture and ETL strategies.
opening_data.skill_set: Data modeling, ETL design, Azure Data Factory, SQL, Hadoop, Spark, Power BI, Azure Databricks, Power Automate, Blob Storage, Data governance, Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)

opening_data.job_requirements:
A Bachelor's Degree or higher.
Must be legally authorized to work in the US.
A minimum of 5 years of experience as a Business Analyst, Technical Analyst, or Systems Analyst building web applications for external clients.
Previous experience internalizing clients’ business operations to ensure proper data validation, business rules & exceptions, and accurate workflows throughout the SDLC.
Understanding of business analysis process concepts, and how business needs drive the implementation approach to solutions.
Experience preparing for and conducting effective JAD sessions to elicit desired functionalities from clients about documented business and functional requirements.
Experience analyzing and developing user stories, acceptance criteria, and test scenarios.
Must have excellent writing skills, including the ability to write user guides and technical/functional documentation for complex processes that are concise yet thorough.
Experience producing project artifacts, including meeting notes, mockups, wireframes, process maps, and data flow diagrams to convey functionality to stakeholders and development teams.
Experience creating and implementing strategies for effective communication and collaboration between the development team and non-technical client stakeholders.
Experience collaborating with development team(s) to design and develop functional solutions.
Experience building relationships with internal and external stakeholders by acting as a trusted advisor and liaison.
Must be self-motivated, resourceful, and adaptable to work efficiently and independently in a remote-first environment.
Strong understanding of how data is structured and its influence on the overall solution, as well as experience analyzing data.
Experience with testing.
Experience using tools (such as Jira, Confluence, or TFS) to document and trace requirements through the software development life cycle.
Proficient in MS Excel, MS Word, MS PowerPoint, and MS Visio.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Collaborate closely with clients, project managers, and software engineers to create, enhance, and support custom web applications.
Effectively communicate how tech solutions meet business needs, refining requirements through JAD sessions.
Work closely with clients and internal development teams to build web applications.
Become the subject matter expert and a trusted resource for your client.
Validate feature specifications.
Participate in vision and strategy exercises for the team.
Identify pain points for the team and organization and work proactively to resolve them.
opening_data.skill_set: System analysis, process analysis, JAD sessions, documentation, communication, client management, data analysis, testing, MS Excel, MS Word, MS PowerPoint, MS Visio, Jira, Confluence, TFS

opening_data.job_requirements:
8+ years of development experience in full stack technologies.
Proficient in HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Sass.
Experience with Java, .Net, PHP, Typescript.
Familiar with modern JS and CSS frameworks like ES6, Sass, Node, NPM, Webpack, Babel, and Flexbox.
Experience with JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, Vue.
Experience with server-side technologies like Apache, Nginx, IIS, Node.js, and J2EE.
Strong knowledge of databases like MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, Firestore.
Knowledge of versioning tools like Git, Mercurial, Bitbucket.
Excellent communication skills.

Design and develop full stack applications.
Work with front-end and back-end technologies.
Build applications for web, mobile web, and native mobile platforms.
Design and develop APIs.
Utilize cloud messaging APIs and push notifications.

opening_data.job_requirements:
10+ years of experience in software development with at least 2+ years in a technical lead or architect role.
Experience in leading project teams of 5-6 members in a Scrum or other Agile methodology environment.
Expert level understanding of HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Sass.
Proficient across multiple modern JS and CSS frameworks and scaffolding, including ES6, Sass, Node and NPM, Webpack and Babel, and Flexbox.
Experience with JavaScript frameworks (e.g., Reactjs, jQuery, Angularjs) and JSON, with an awareness of the pros and cons of different JS frameworks.
Thorough understanding of responsive design, browser behavior and compatibility, and cross-browser optimization/troubleshooting.
Solid knowledge of the concepts and advantages of using compression and other optimization techniques (e.g., sprites) to improve front-end performance.
Solid knowledge of common creational, structural, and behavioral design patterns and programming models.
Familiar with data modeling and the relationship between front-end development and back-end data sources.
Working knowledge in implementing custom visualization (data, graphics, animations, etc.).
Familiar with at least one tool to analyze performance within a system (e.g., Java profilers, DB profilers, etc.).
Ability to troubleshoot, debug, performance-tune, and optimize a module of code.
Working knowledge of front-end optimization tools (e.g., Rhino or YUI for JS Compression) and web server gzip compression.
Familiarity with Tag Management tools (e.g., GTM/Optimost/Adobe Launch/etc.).
Experience with source code management tools (e.g., Git, SVN, Ant, Maven).
Ability to lead client-facing conversations and produce quality design documents acceptable for client consumption.
Able to help set up and configure a local development environment and build process, including leveraging build systems (e.g., Gulp, Grunt, Webpack) and unit testing.
Understand SEO and Accessibility best practices.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Collaborate with creative and user experience teams to bring unique and engaging interfaces to life.
Push the limits with modern technology and platform architectures to expand upon the ways we can engage and capture the attention of our customers through our applications interface.
Work across some of the largest brands and enterprise clients to deliver web and mobile applications.
Actively participate and take part in crafting our front-end community and vision, where we avidly review, refine, and promote standards and best practices across different platforms.
Lead development across large features and views, working across all aspects of the development cycle.
Assist the Solution Architect in crafting the application architecture, estimating and assigning tasks, and implementing some of the more challenging aspects of the delivery.
Develop and document standards and best practices and educate the community on them.
Prioritize requests and work intake to help the team focus their time on the most important work.
Initiate, organize and drive development efforts for a team of engineers over a shared codebase.
Drive solution design discussions with external teams while representing the client perspective and desires.
Participate in vision and strategy exercises for the team.
Identify pain points for the team and organization and work proactively to resolve them.
opening_data.skill_set: HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, Sass, ES6, React.js, jQuery, Angular.js, Node, NPM, Webpack, Babel, Flexbox, responsive design, cross-browser optimization, front-end performance, data visualization, Git, SVN, Ant, Maven, Gulp, Grunt, Webpack

opening_data.job_requirements:
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Systems or a related field.
 8+ years of experience in a software testing or quality assurance role.
 5+ years of experience in developing automation or performance testing scripts for large complex software projects, eCommerce experience preferred.
 Must have a demonstrated track record of delivering test automation, quality requirements, designing functional test suites and producing deliverables that exceed commitments.
 Experience using Selenium, Nightwatch.js, REST Assured, BrowserStack, Zephyr Scale, ZAPI, Cucumber, JMeter, LoadRunner, or similar frameworks.
 Strong JavaScript skills required.
 Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.
 Experience with Dynatrace or New Relic beneficial.
 Experience using Jira beneficial.
 SQL skills and DevOps experience, including setting up CI/CD pipelines and building end-to-end automation frameworks, beneficial.
 Experience with Agile/Scrum methodology or similar development processes beneficial.
 Ability to provide technical leadership for automation and performance testing.
 Ability to drive change to improve processes.
 Innovative, resourceful, passionate about ensuring high-quality, high-performance, and highly available software.
 Willingness to learn new technologies and skills.
 Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Review functional requirements and identify test cases.
 Automate test cases including integration and API tests following best practices and with focus on speed and reusability.
 Build efficient, practical, and scalable automation solutions.
 Implement holistic automation strategies, taking account of the interconnections and dependencies across multiple development teams.
 Extend automation to include service provisioning, test data management, dash boarding, and business process validation.
 Develop and execute test plans through manual testing as needed.
 Identify, evaluate, and document issues with appropriate priority and severity.
 Provide input in the evolving development of Website and eCommerce platforms.
 Review existing automated and performance test coverage and identify testing gaps.
 Review automation or performance testing results and error logs, troubleshoot issues, and work with team to resolve defects in a timely manner.
 Regularly review and update automation tests and framework to ensure reliable results.
 Troubleshoot issues with testing environments or CI/CD tools impacting automated tests or test results.
 Investigate and implement initiatives and tools to improve automation and performance testing.
 Communicate clearly and work closely with other engineers within the team and across teams, including team members in locations across the globe.
 Other tasks and responsibilities from time to time.
opening_data.skill_set: Test Automation, Selenium, Nightwatch.js, REST Assured, BrowserStack, Zephyr Scale, ZAPI, Cucumber, JMeter, LoadRunner, JavaScript, SQL, Dynatrace, New Relic, Jira, CI/CD pipelines, Agile, Scrum, DevOps, Communication, Troubleshooting, Leadership

opening_data.job_requirements:
5 years of experience as a DevOps Engineer.
Proficiency in system automation, deployment, and monitoring tools.
Experience with Linux, Jenkins, and scripting languages like Python and Shell.
Knowledge of CI systems and distributed data systems.
Strong IaC expertise with CDK, CloudFormation, or Terraform.
Hands-on experience in designing and running large-scale cloud networking.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Lead and guide DevOps activities to support client projects.
Design and integrate NearTekPod Cloud Platform and core services.
Develop automated CI/CD processes and ensure adherence to security standards.
Architect enterprise-scale cloud environments and ensure scalability and security.

opening_data.job_requirements:
Programming Skills-knowledge of statistical programming languages like R, Python, and database query languages like SQL, Hive, Pig is desirable. Familiarity with Scala, Java, or C++ is an added advantage.
 Statistics – Good applied statistical skills, including knowledge of statistical tests, distributions, regression, maximum likelihood estimators, etc. Proficiency in statistics is essential for data-driven companies.
 Machine Learning – good knowledge of machine learning methods like k-Nearest Neighbors, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests.
 Strong Math Skills (Multivariable Calculus and Linear Algebra) – understanding the fundamentals of Multivariable Calculus and Linear Algebra is important as they form the basis of a lot of predictive performance or algorithm optimization techniques.
 Data Wrangling – proficiency in handling imperfections in data is an important aspect of a data scientist job description.
 Experience with Data Visualization Tools like matplotlib, ggplot, d3.js, Tableau that help to visually encode data.
 Excellent Communication Skills – it is incredibly important to describe findings to a technical and non-technical audience.
 Strong Software Engineering Background.
 Hands-on experience with data science tools.
 Problem-solving aptitude.
 Analytical mind and great business sense.
 Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field is preferred.
 Proven Experience as Data Analyst or Data Scientist.
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Data mining or extracting usable data from valuable data sources.
 Using machine learning tools to select features, create and optimize classifiers.
 Carrying out the preprocessing of structured and unstructured data.
 Enhancing data collection procedures to include all relevant information for developing analytic systems.
 Processing, cleansing, and validating the integrity of data to be used for analysis.
 Analyzing large amounts of information to find patterns and solutions.
 Developing prediction systems and machine learning algorithms.
 Presenting results in a clear manner.
 Propose solutions and strategies to tackle business challenges.
 Collaborate with Business and IT teams.
opening_data.experience: Proven Experience as Data Analyst or Data Scientist
opening_data.skill_set: Data Mining, Machine Learning, Feature Selection, Data Preprocessing, Data Collection, Data Cleansing, Data Validation, Data Analysis, Prediction Systems, Machine Learning Algorithms, Data Visualization, Statistical Programming, R, Python, SQL, Hive, Pig, Scala, Java, C++, Multivariable Calculus, Linear Algebra, matplotlib, ggplot, d3.js, Tableau, Communication, Software Engineering, Problem-solving, Analytical Skills

opening_data.job_requirements:
We are looking for an experienced Salesforce Technical Lead to join our rapidly growing Digital Software Engineering team.
As a Salesforce Technical Lead, you will help deliver our digital strategy and lead the design and implementation of new solutions which will transform consumer and patient experiences.
You will be laser-focused on designing high-performing, scalable, and secure solutions which will enable our ministry to rapidly respond to changing consumer and market conditions.
This is a hands-on role that requires significant technical experience and abilities with salesforce.com and related cloud technologies.
If you are a natural leader with a passion for technology and optimizing customers’ digital experience, then this could be the career you've been looking for!
opening_data.job_responsibility:
Develop solutions that effectively utilize the Salesforce platform based on the business needs.
Custom development and integration expertise is necessary.
Design and develop comprehensive Salesforce solutions, including custom development with Apex, Triggers, Visualforce, and Lightning web components, as well as external data integration using middleware tools and Salesforce APIs.
Act as the go-to person by providing Salesforce technical advice, design direction, and leadership to all team members to advance the project.
Streamline business operations using Salesforce's automation tools.
Design, build, and configure highly functional, scalable, and easily maintained applications.
Provide application support by analyzing defects, replicating/fixing defects, and providing root cause analysis.
Troubleshoot and resolve functional and performance-related issues.
Engage in all phases of the development cycle, including interacting with business owners, requirements gathering, application design, development, testing, fixing, and maintenance of the platform.
Mentor and guide less-senior developers.
opening_data.skill_set: Salesforce Marketing Cloud, SQL, AMPscript, Data Modelling, Integration Design
